data.name: Ghostland Yard
data.detailed_description:
Brave dangers to find your friends


In this challenging 2D precision platformer, find out what happened to Poe’s ghosts friends ! Travel through more than 130 hand-crafted levels in over 6 different environments, confront their bosses and uncover the truth about the Ghost Land Yard’s investigators.

Easy to pickup ...


The controls are simple and accessible - move left, right, jump and voilà! Almost instant respawns and smooth character controller keep you running through the world in your quest for the truth.

... Hard to master!


With great mastery of your character, you will be able to find new paths, shortcuts and secrets ! Race as fast as possible to climb the leaderboard and compare your performance with your friends.

Game Features


  • Classic 2D platformer with modern quality of life features
  • Tightly tuned 2D controls. Run and jump across the deadliest traps !
  • More than 130 handcrafted levels
  • Travel through 6 different worlds, each one with new gameplay elements
  • Defeat the 6 different bosses present in the game
  • Make your way through 6 bonus races
  • A catchy soundtrack to rythm your adventure
  • Discover secret areas and hidden levels
  • Accessibility features such as : color-blind mode, 100% controller integration or invincible mode

data.short_description: Uncover the truth about the Ghostland Yard investigators disappearance in this challenging 2D precision platformer. Travel through 6 differents environment in more than 130 hand-crafted levels to find your friends !

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 1115G4
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics for 11th Gen
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
